title: Did Joe Biden Once Say He Was Conservative About Most Issues Except Civil Rights?
subtitle: Biden's remarks appeared in an expansive 1974 'Washingtonian' feature following his election as the youngest member of the U.S. Senate.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Joe Biden once said that, “When it comes to civil rights and civil liberties, I’m a liberal but that’s it. I’m really quite conservative on most other issues.”
